datasetParam.name: clinical_visits_by_sourceid
datasetParam.help:
Input a set of source IDs, or upload a file

It can be delimited by a comma, semi colon or any white space.

Its possible that not all the IDs in the list will be found in the database due to anumber of reasons such as unavailable ID mapping. It is currenly not possible to inform which IDs did not match anything in the database

filterParamNew.name: visits_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on their visit characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: relative_visits_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select relative visits based on their visit characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: visits_visitage_metadata_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select the age of the participants at the time of their clinical visits.

filterParamNew.name: geographic_region
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on the participants subcounty where they live.

filterParamNew.name: dwellings_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on the household characteristics where the participants live.

filterParamNew.name: participants_nf
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

dateRangeParam.name: visit_date
dateRangeParam.help: "select the earliest and latest dates to include for identifying visits and computing mosquito counts."

numberRangeParam.name: days_between
numberRangeParam.help: Set the range of days between visits to compare to visits selected in the previous step

enumParam.name: dateOperator
enumParam.help: Choose how to compare these two visits. Do you want to remove visits that have another visit within the specified time frame or keep them.

enumParam.name: date_direction
enumParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding visit. Will the matching visit be before or after relative to the first visit.

flatVocabParam.name: use_relative_visits
flatVocabParam.help: You MUST change this parameter to Yes in order to use relative visits! If you decide to not use relative visits, set this parameter to No and make certain "Keep or remove visits" is set to remove.

flatVocabParam.name: dateOperator_fv
flatVocabParam.help: Choose how to compare these two visits. Do you want to remove visits that have another visit within the specified time frame or keep them.

flatVocabParam.name: date_direction_fv
flatVocabParam.help: Choose a direction for the corresponding visit. Will the matching visit be before or after relative to the first visit.

filterParamNew.name: visits_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on their visit characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: visits_visitage_metadata_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select the age of the participants at the time of their clinical visits.

filterParamNew.name: geographic_region_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on the participants subcounty where they live.

filterParamNew.name: dwellings_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select visits based on the household characteristics where the participants live.

filterParamNew.name: participants_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select participants based on their characteristics.

filterParamNew.name: relative_visits_nf_maled
filterParamNew.help: Select relative visits based on their visit characteristics.

sqlQuery.name: dateDirection
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'after' as term, '>=' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'before' as term, '<=' as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: dateOperator
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT * from ( SELECT 'remove' as term, 'MINUS' as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'keep' as term, 'INTERSECT' as internal from dual where $$use_relative_visits$$ = 1 ) ORDER by term desc

sqlQuery.name: useRelativeVisits
sqlQuery.sql: SELECT 'No' as term, 0 as internal from dual UNION SELECT 'Yes' as term, 1 as internal from dual

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeOntologyNf
sqlQuery.sql: select o.ontology_term_name, 'dummy' as parent_ontology_term_name, o.display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o where ontology_term_name = 'Age at time of visit' union select 'dummy' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Dwelling' as display_name, null as description, null as units, 'string' as type, 0 as is_range, null as precision from dual

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaDataNf
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct cva.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.property as ontology_term_name, '1' as string_value, cva.EUPATH_0000113 as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value from apidbtuning.participantattributes pa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes cva, apidbtuning.metadatatype m where cva.protocol_app_node_id in ($$geographic_region$$) and cva.EUPATH_0000091 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and cva.EUPATH_0000091 <= $$visit_date.max$$ and io.output_node_id = cva.protocol_app_node_id and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and m.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000113' AND least(pa.EUPATH_0000152, $$visit_date.max$$) - greatest(pa.EUPATH_0000151, $$visit_date.min$$) + 1 >= $$duration_observation$$

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaDataBkgdNf
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct cva.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.property as ontology_term_name, '1' as string_value, cva.EUPATH_0000113 as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value from apidbtuning.participantattributes pa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes cva, apidbtuning.metadatatype m where io.output_node_id = cva.protocol_app_node_id and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and m.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000113'

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaDataSummary
sqlQuery.sql: select cva.protocol_app_node_id as internal, mt.property as ontology_term_name, da.EUPATH_0000054 as string_value, cast(null as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value from apidbtuning.dwellingattributes da,apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iob, apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes cva,apidbtuning.metadatatype mt where da.protocol_app_node_id = ioa.input_node_id and ioa.output_node_id = iob.input_node_id and iob.output_node_id = cva.protocol_app_node_id and mt.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000054'

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct ioa.output_node_id as internal, mt.property as ontology_term_name, da.EUPATH_0000054 as string_value, cast(null as number) as number_value, cast(null as date) as date_value from apidbtuning.dwellingattributes da,apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iob, apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes cva,apidbtuning.metadatatype mt where da.protocol_app_node_id = ioa.input_node_id and ioa.output_node_id = iob.input_node_id and iob.output_node_id = cva.protocol_app_node_id and mt.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000054'

sqlQuery.name: DwellingOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct term from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Dwelling type' and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000094') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name union select 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as parent_ontology_term_name, 'Average Anopheles Collected' as display_name, 'Average number of Anopheles collected in monthly CDC light traps during the dates of this search' as description, null as units, 'number' as type, 1 as is_range, null as precision from dual

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaDataSummary
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct dw.protocol_app_node_id as dwelling_id, pa.protocol_app_node_id as part_id, iov.output_node_id as visit_id from apidbtuning.participantattributes pa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iov, apidbtuning.dwellingattributes dw where iov.output_node_id in ($$participants_nf$$) and pa.protocol_app_node_id = iov.input_node_id and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.output_node_id and io.input_node_id = dw.protocol_app_node_id) select distinct Part.visit_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, part where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Dwelling type' and part.dwelling_id = m.protocol_app_node_id union select part.visit_id as internal, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.protocol_app_node_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from apidbtuning.dwellingattributes da, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.lighttrapattributes la where da.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and la.protocol_app_node_id = io.output_node_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$visit_date.max$$ group by da.protocol_app_node_id) mos, part where part.dwelling_id = mos.protocol_app_node_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct dw.protocol_app_node_id as dwelling_id, pa.protocol_app_node_id as part_id from apidbtuning.participantattributes pa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iov, apidbtuning.dwellingattributes dw where iov.output_node_id in ($$participants_nf$$) and pa.protocol_app_node_id = iov.input_node_id and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.output_node_id and io.input_node_id = dw.protocol_app_node_id) select distinct Part.dwelling_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, part where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Dwelling type' and part.dwelling_id = m.protocol_app_node_id union select distinct part.dwelling_id as internal, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.protocol_app_node_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from apidbtuning.dwellingattributes da, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.lighttrapattributes la where da.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and la.protocol_app_node_id = io.output_node_id and la.OBI_0001619 >= $$visit_date.min$$ and la.OBI_0001619 <= $$visit_date.max$$ group by da.protocol_app_node_id) mos, part where part.dwelling_id = mos.protocol_app_node_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaDataBkgd
sqlQuery.sql: with part as ( select distinct iod.input_node_id as dwelling_id,pa.protocol_app_node_id as part_id from (select min(EUPATH_0000113) as min_age, max(EUPATH_0000113) as max_age from apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes ) age, apidbtuning.participantattributes pa, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iop, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iod where pa.protocol_app_node_id = iop.input_node_id and pa.protocol_app_node_id = iod.output_node_id ) select distinct Part.dwelling_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, part where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Dwelling type' and part.dwelling_id = m.protocol_app_node_id union select distinct part.dwelling_id as internal, 'average anopheles' as ontology_term_name, null as string_value, nvl(mos.avg_anoph,0) as number_value, null as date_value from (select da.protocol_app_node_id, round(avg(nvl(EUPATH_0000192,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000193,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000204,0)+nvl(EUPATH_0000205,0)),1) as avg_anoph from apidbtuning.dwellingattributes da, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.lighttrapattributes la where da.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and la.protocol_app_node_id = io.output_node_id group by da.protocol_app_node_id) mos, part where part.dwelling_id = mos.protocol_app_node_id(+)

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct term from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Participant' and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000032') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataSummary
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct io.output_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from (select min(EUPATH_0000113) as min_age, max(EUPATH_0000113) as max_age from apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes where protocol_app_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf$$) ) age, apidbtuning.metadata m, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.participantattributes pa where io.output_node_id in ($$geographic_region$$) and io.input_node_id = pa.protocol_app_node_id AND least(pa.EUPATH_0000152, $$visit_date.max$$, pa.EUPATH_0000032 + ( age.max_age * 365)) - greatest(pa.EUPATH_0000151, $$visit_date.min$$, pa.EUPATH_0000032 + ( age.min_age * 365)) + 1 >= $$duration_observation$$ and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and io.output_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf$$) and pa.protocol_app_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id and m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct pa.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from (select min(EUPATH_0000113) as min_age, max(EUPATH_0000113) as max_age from apidbtuning.clinicalvisitattributes where protocol_app_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf$$) ) age, apidbtuning.metadata m, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.participantattributes pa where io.output_node_id in ($$geographic_region$$) and io.input_node_id = pa.protocol_app_node_id AND least(pa.EUPATH_0000152, $$visit_date.max$$, pa.EUPATH_0000032 + ( age.max_age * 365)) - greatest(pa.EUPATH_0000151, $$visit_date.min$$, pa.EUPATH_0000032 + ( age.min_age * 365)) + 1 >= $$duration_observation$$ and pa.protocol_app_node_id = io.input_node_id and io.output_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf$$) and pa.protocol_app_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id and m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: VisitOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct term from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category in ('Visit','Specimen type') and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000094') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitOntology
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct term from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category in ('Visit','Specimen type') and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000094') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Visit' and m.protocol_app_node_id in ($$dwellings_nf$$) union select io.input_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io where dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Specimen type' and m.term = 'Specimen type' and io.output_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id and io.input_node_id in ($$dwellings_nf$$)

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaDataBkgd
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct protocol_app_node_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and category = 'Visit' union select io.input_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io where dataset_name = $$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Specimen type' and m.term = 'Specimen type' and io.output_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct protocol_app_node_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Visit' union select io.input_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_ICEMR_PRISM_surveillance_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Specimen type' and m.term = 'Specimen type' and io.output_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iov, apidbtuning.metadata m where iov.output_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf_maled$$) and iov.input_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and iov.input_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataSummary_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct iov.output_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio iov, apidbtuning.metadata m where iov.output_node_id in ($$visits_visitage_metadata_nf_maled$$) and iov.input_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and iov.input_node_id = m.protocol_app_node_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: ParticipantMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Participant'

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event' and m.protocol_app_node_id in ($$dwellings_nf_maled$$)

sqlQuery.name: VisitMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event'

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaDataNf_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct io.hh_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where io.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and ioe.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.protocol_app_node_id in ($$geographic_region_maled$$) and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event' and m.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000644' and io.event_id = m.protocol_app_node_id

sqlQuery.name: SummaryClinicalVisitAgeMetaDataNf_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct io.event_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where io.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and ioe.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.protocol_app_node_id in ($$geographic_region_maled$$) and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event' and m.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000644' and io.event_id = m.protocol_app_node_id

sqlQuery.name: ClinicalVisitAgeMetaDataBkgdNf_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct io.hh_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where io.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000096' and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and ioe.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Event' and m.source_id = 'EUPATH_0000644' and io.event_id = m.protocol_app_node_id

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaDataSummary_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.event_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where io.input_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and ioe.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.protocol_app_node_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household' and m.source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: RegionMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.hh_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where io.input_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024' and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and ioe.output_type_source_id = 'EUPATH_0000738') io where m.protocol_app_node_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household' and m.source_id in ('EUPATH_0000054','OBI_0001627','EUPATH_0000452')

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaDataSummary_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.event_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where ioe.output_node_id in ($$participants_nf_maled$$) and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and io.input_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024') io where m.protocol_app_node_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household'

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select io.hh_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m, ( select distinct io.input_node_id as hh_id, ioe.output_node_id as event_id from apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio io, apidbtuning.protocolappnodeio ioe where ioe.output_node_id in ($$participants_nf_maled$$) and io.output_node_id = ioe.input_node_id and io.input_type_source_id = 'PCO_0000024') io where m.protocol_app_node_id = io.hh_id and m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household'

sqlQuery.name: DwellingMetaDataBkgd_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct m.protocol_app_node_id as internal, m.term as ontology_term_name, m.string_value, m.number_value, m.date_value from apidbtuning.metadata m where m.dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and m.category = 'Household'

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitOntology_maled
sqlQuery.sql: with leaf as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct term from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Event' and source_id != 'EUPATH_0000094') md where o.ontology_term_name = md.term), first as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from leaf where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) par where o.ontology_term_name = par.parent_ontology_term_name), second as ( select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from first where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) gpar where o.ontology_term_name = gpar.parent_ontology_term_name) select * from leaf union select * from first union select * from second union select o.ontology_term_name, CASE WHEN o.parent_ontology_term_name = 'Thing' THEN null ELSE o.parent_ontology_term_name END as parent_ontology_term_name, nvl(o.display_name,o.ontology_term_name) as display_name, o.description, o.units,o.type,o.is_range,o.precision from apidbtuning.metadataontology o, (select distinct parent_ontology_term_name from second where parent_ontology_term_name is not null) ggpar where o.ontology_term_name = ggpar.parent_ontology_term_name

sqlQuery.name: RelVisitMetaData_maled
sqlQuery.sql: select distinct protocol_app_node_id as internal, term as ontology_term_name, string_value, number_value, date_value from apidbtuning.metadata where dataset_name = 'ISASimple_Gates_MAL-ED_stdm_tp_RSRC' --$$dataset$$ and category = 'Event'
